relevant_findings.general: Patient was alert and oriented, did not appear ill.
relevant_findings.heart: First and second heart sounds were normal.
relevant_findings.abdomen: Not distended, bowel sounds present, no tenderness on palpation or hepatosplenomegaly.

skin.description: Area of blanching erythema, 6 cm in diameter.

relevant_findings.petechiae: Noted in the erythematous lesions and on the left flank.
